00043 class TeapotWarsScene : public IScreenElement, public Scene
00044 {
00045 public:
00046         TeapotWarsScene() : Scene() { }
00047 
00048         // IScreenElement Implementation
00049         virtual void VOnUpdate(int deltaMS) { OnUpdate(deltaMS); };
00050         virtual HRESULT VOnRestore() 
00051                 { OnRestore(); return S_OK; }
00052         virtual HRESULT VOnRender(double fTime, float fElapsedTime)
00053                 { OnRender(); return S_OK; }
00054         virtual int VGetZOrder() const { return 1; }
00055         virtual void VSetZOrder(int const zOrder) { }
00056 
00057         // Don't handle any messages
00058         virtual LRESULT CALLBACK VOnMsgProc( AppMsg msg ) { return 0; }
00059 
00060         virtual bool VIsVisible() const { return true; }
00061         virtual void VSetVisible(bool visible) { }
00062         virtual bool VAddChild(optional<ActorId> id, shared_ptr<ISceneNode> kid) { return Scene::AddChild(id, kid); }
00063 };

00156 class AITeapotView : public IGameView 
00157 {
00158         friend class AITeapotViewListener;
00159 
00160 private:
00161         int m_fireTimer;
00162 
00163 protected:
00164         GameViewId      m_ViewId;
00165         optional<ActorId> m_PlayerActorId;
00166 
00167 public:
00168         AITeapotView();
00169         virtual HRESULT VOnRestore()
00170         {
00171                 return S_OK;
00172         }
00173 
00174         virtual void VOnRender(double fTime, float fElapsedTime){}
00175         virtual void VOnLostDevice(){}
00176         virtual GameViewType VGetType()
00177         {
00178                 return GameView_AI;
00179         }
00180         virtual GameViewId VGetId() const 
00181         { 
00182                 return m_ViewId; 
00183         }
00184 
00185         virtual void VOnAttach(GameViewId vid, optional<ActorId> aid)
00186         { 
00187                 m_ViewId = vid; 
00188                 m_PlayerActorId = aid;
00189         }
00190 
00191         virtual LRESULT CALLBACK VOnMsgProc( AppMsg msg )
00192         {
00193                 return 0;
00194         }
00195 
00196         virtual void VOnUpdate( int deltaMilliseconds );
00197 
00198         virtual ~AITeapotView() { };
00199 };
